amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce unauthorized nondefense accounts to 2016 levels and also sought to reduce various other programs by $185 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds made available to various accounts in the Department of Energy by an aggregate total of $148,544,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walker amendment (A067) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 291 (Roll no. 262).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Walker amendment (A067) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 291 (Roll no. 262).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A067) offered by Mr. Walker.
